泡.definition: bubble; foam; blister; to soak; to steep; to infuse; to dawdle; to loiter; to pick up (a girl); to get off with (a sexual partner); classifier for occurrences of an action; classifier for number of infusions

泡吧.definition: to spend time in a bar (alcohol, Internet etc); to go clubbing

泡妞.definition: to pick up girls; to play around with girls; to chase after girls

泡水.definition: to infuse; to soak in water

泡泡紗.definition: seersucker (cotton cloth with pattern of dimples)

泡湯.definition: (coll.) to fizzle out; to come to nothing; to dawdle; to stall; (Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring bath

泡溫泉.definition: to soak in a spa or hot spring

泡澡.definition: to bathe; to immerse oneself in a warm bath

泡病號.definition: to dilly-dally on the pretence of being ill; to malinger

泡罩塔.definition: distillation tower; bubble tower; plate column

泡芙人.definition: (coll.) skinny fat person (person who is MONW: metabolically obese normal weight)

泡蘑菇.definition: to procrastinate; to shilly-shally and waste time

泡製.definition: to infuse; to brew (a herbal remedy or beverage)

泡飯.definition: to soak cooked rice in soup or water; cooked rice reheated in boiling water

泡饃.definition: meat and bread soup (a specialty of Shaanxi cuisine)

泡騰.definition: to bubble; to fizz; to effervesce
